es.ucm.fdi.tp.basecode.bgame.control.commands

Class RestartCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.ucm.fdi.tp.basecode.bgame.control.commands.RestartCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Command, java.io.Serializable

    public class RestartCommand
extends java.lang.Object
implements Command
    A 'RESTART' command. It executes Controller.restart() of the corresponding controller.

    Comando 'RESTART'. Ejecuta el metodo Controller.restart() del controlador correspondiente.

    See Also:
